name: EQ for YouTube
description: A 6-band parametric EQ Chrome extension for YouTube with channel-specific settings
features: 6-Band parametric EQ with adjustable gain, frequency, and Q factor
Clean, modern interface with responsive controls
Collapsible Advanced Controls for simplified interface
Built-in presets and custom preset creation
Dark/light theme with system preference detection
Clear power toggle with green/red status indicators
No keyboard shortcuts for streamlined experience
